extendedInfo.description: Celebrate 4th of July in style with the coolest 4th of July fireworks live wallpaper available! A fireworks show behind lady liberty.This 4th of July live wallpaper brings all sorts of cool patriotism to your home screen as well as fireworks sounds!Touch the screen to hear fireworks as you watch the red, white, and blue fireworks fly all around Lady Liberty.This 4th of July wallpaper is also capable of changing the background and lighting of Lady Liberty to mimic the sun, so it will be dark when it's dark outside and then brighten up in the morning. As the day progresses, the background will darken again. So you can watch a fireworks show day and night!Works great on tablets too! Add a beautiful fireworks show to all of your Android devices this 4th of July.Upgrade to the full version from within the live wallpaper's settings to unlock all features.You can customize the 4th of July live wallpaper by the following:- Choose to hear fireworks sounds when you touch the screen (full version)- Choose to hear fireworks sounds when you drop/move widgets on the home screen (full version)- Adjust the speed of the fireworks (full version)- Adjust the amount of the fireworks (full version)- Choose to have the background follow the sun (full version)Enjoy this live wallpaper and have a Happy 4th of July!To install the Lady Liberty live wallpaper, press menu > Wallpaper > Live wallpapers > Lady LibertyBe sure to check out our other holiday live wallpapers and apps!Have a safe and responsible Independence Day and be sure to get out and see some actual fireworks as well :)

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: LOVE this app! Nothing portrays July 4th better than fireworks over the statue of liberty...the rest look like weddings anywhere in the world.
reviews.author: A Google User
